report.title: Another Experimental Route
report.author: Murple
report.bodytext: Well, nobody has tried this yet, so... /n /n 8:50PM /n ------ /n I weigh out 6mg of 5-MeO-DIPT, chop it up into fine powder, and /n divide it into two lines of approximately 3mg each. I divide each of these /n in 2 again. /n /n 8:53PM /n ------ /n 1.5mg up one nostril, 1.5 up the other! The smell/taste is similar /n to DPT - or any other tryptamine for that matter. I'm glad that 5-MeO-DIPT /n has a very low dosage range... it would not be pleasant to insufflate /n large quantities of this. I have an immediate sense that 'something' is /n coming, but the effects are not instantaneous. /n /n 8:58PM /n ------ /n Yuck! The drip from this stuff tastes very bad, and also is giving /n a very uncomfortable burning sensation in the back of my throat. Neither /n saline nasal spray nor drinking seems to help. I guess I just need to wait /n it out. /n /n 9:05PM /n ------ /n I am beginning to feel a tryptamine lift, and the bitter burning /n taste in my throat is subsiding. /n /n 9:20PM /n ------ /n The taste in my throat has cleared up, and I'm definately feeling /n the effects now. At this point, its still fairly mild, and feels like what /n I would expect from the same ammount done orally. I wonder if it will /n build any more, or if I should do some more? I decide its best to wait /n another 10 minutes or so, just in case. /n /n 9:30PM /n ------ /n I'm feeling a rather good effect. I seem to have reached a plateau /n now. It feels slightly stronger than this dose would orally - but not by /n much. I feel warm, trippy, and happy. I have very mild visual enhancement /n (bright colors etc), like I would expect from a low oral dose of /n 5-MeO-DIPT. The time it took from insufflation to peak effect was roughly /n 25-30 minutes. I think a little more will do nicely. 2 lines of 1.5mg each /n are still on the plate, I think one of them is in order - if not both... /n /n 9:40PM /n ------ /n I insufflate one of the 1.5mg lines. /n /n 9:50PM /n ------ /n Fuck it. Up with the other 1.5mg! /n /n 10:02PM /n ------- /n This route seems to be about co-effective with oral. Same dosage /n range (though maybe insufflated is SLIGHTLY more efficient). Similar /n subjective effects, although this seems a little more energetic, and it /n hit alot faster. The neck tension and jaw clench seems a little less /n prominent. There is no trace of stomach discomfort. This is a very clean /n experience compared to my oral experiments with 5-MeO-DIPT. This is an /n exceedingly comfortable place. This feels like wrapping up in a warm fuzzy /n blanket in front of a fire on a winter night. /n /n 10:32PM /n ------- /n Ahhh... very nice. The last few lines are fully kicked in. I am at /n a very solid +2. Warmth, a nice tryptamine body high, a relaxed and mellow /n mindset. Some mild visual enhancements and perhaps even hits of OEVs /n scurrying past the corners of my eyes. I feel like going to lay down and /n relax and think for a while. /n /n 11:00PM /n ------- /n Wow. Laying on my couch and listening to my fan was amazing. A /n timeless sense of relaxation and bliss. Thinking contentedly about life. /n Everything is good. I feel very introspective, in a warm fuzzy way. Again, /n the sensation is similar to the coming down phase of a very good LSD trip. /n I do feel that I am lower down now than I was a half hour ago, however. A /n few quick tokes of cannabis, then off to lay down for a few more minutes. /n /n 11:11PM /n ------- /n I'm unable to return to that warm, floaty place. I seem to be /n coming down a good deal now. I am still quite high but the mental effects /n are now taking a back seat to the purely physical sensation of /n tryptamineness. The bright colors are still very prominent. But the peak /n effects are beginning to subside. I feel I've still got a long glide down. /n /n 11:50PM /n ------- /n I'm a little lower than I was. Its very hard to judge how far you /n have come with this substance. Its very difficult to tell if I'm feeling /n less effect than a half hour ago, or to tell what effects have dissipated. /n But I know that I am alot further towards baseline than I was a half hour /n ago, nevertheless. I did notice a sort of laxative effect just now - an /n increase in peristalsis, rather. Perhaps the stomach effects of oral doses /n are not just because of chemical irritation of the stomach or intestine, /n but also due to some sort of neurological process? Perhaps it is /n interacting with serotonin receptors in the brain stem. Its a non-issue /n though. There was no discomfort whatsoever. This was a far cleaner /n experience than oral... except for the bad tasting drip. I think I will be /n using this route more than the oral route, despite my usual aversion to /n snorting things. Its just a cleaner trip this way. /n /n 12:30AM /n ------- /n I'm pretty far down now. Could probably sleep without too much /n effort now. This experiment exceeded my expectations quite a bit.
